title: Client participants: Baseline measures
description: Measures collected before the start of the study for client participants. As many of these measures are collected at 'baseline' it is currently called 'baseline.' However, this is a slight misnomer as, for example, current_study_status is dynamically updated.

data_dictionary.name: jdc_person_id
data_dictionary.title: JCOIN data commons person identifier
data_dictionary.description: The generated unique identifier specific to the JCOIN Data Commons for a given individual (client or staff).

data_dictionary.name: quarter_enrolled
data_dictionary.title: Quarter Enrolled
data_dictionary.description: The financial quarter and year of enrollment

data_dictionary.name: state_of_site_enrollment
data_dictionary.title: State of Site For Enrollment
data_dictionary.description: The U.S. State abbreviation of the site where client (participant) was initially enrolled

data_dictionary.name: current_study_status
data_dictionary.title: Current Study Status
data_dictionary.description: A summary of the current status where client (participant) is in study

data_dictionary.name: age
data_dictionary.title: Age
data_dictionary.description: About how old are you? (top coded at 90)

data_dictionary.name: sex_at_birth
data_dictionary.title: Sex at birth
data_dictionary.description: What sex was originally listed on your birth certificate?

data_dictionary.name: gender_id
data_dictionary.title: Gender Identity
data_dictionary.description: What is your gender identity?

enum: Genderqueer/gender nonconforming/neither exclusively male nor female

data_dictionary.notes:
For gender/orientation/identity, use items O1-O2 if possible, otherwise use D4a-D4c.   [Must use one or the other.]
 False if not 'Male' and not 'Transfgender' else True

data_dictionary.name: gender_id_condensed
data_dictionary.title: Gender Identity (condensed)
data_dictionary.description: What is your gender identity?
data_dictionary.notes: For gender/orientation/identity, use items O1-O2 if possible, otherwise use D4a-D4c.   [Must use one or the other.]

data_dictionary.name: race_white
data_dictionary.title: Race: White
data_dictionary.description: [White] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_black
data_dictionary.title: Race: Black or African American
data_dictionary.description: [Black or African American] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_AIAN
data_dictionary.title: Race: American Indian or Alaska Native
data_dictionary.description: [American Indian or Alaska Native] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_hawaiian_OPI
data_dictionary.title: Race: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
data_dictionary.description: [Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_asian
data_dictionary.title: Race: Asian
data_dictionary.description: [Asian] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_other
data_dictionary.title: Race: Other
data_dictionary.description: [Other] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_AI_tribe
data_dictionary.title: Race: American indian principal tribe or community specified
data_dictionary.description: [American indian principal tribe or community specified] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: race_other_specified
data_dictionary.title: Race: Other specified
data_dictionary.description: [Other specified] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY

data_dictionary.name: hispanic_latino
data_dictionary.title: Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish Origin
data_dictionary.description: Are you of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin?

data_dictionary.name: race
data_dictionary.title: Race
data_dictionary.description:
Racial category derived from the individual racial category fields.
  - Exactly one racial category field selected = title of racial category
  - Two or more selected = Multiracial

enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

data_dictionary.name: sex_orient_category
data_dictionary.title: Sexual orientation
data_dictionary.description: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself as...

data_dictionary.name: sex_orient_other
data_dictionary.title: Sexual orientation:  Other specified
data_dictionary.description: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself as...

data_dictionary.name: ever_pregnant
data_dictionary.title: Ever pregnant
data_dictionary.description: Have you ever been pregnant?

enum: Previously pregnant, did not have a child

data_dictionary.notes: Does this just apply to that past 90 days?  If not, then the participant should be able to check more than one response.

data_dictionary.name: marital_status
data_dictionary.title: Marital status
data_dictionary.description: What is your marital status?

data_dictionary.name: living_as_married
data_dictionary.title: Married with partner
data_dictionary.description: Are you currently living as married with a romantic partner?

enum: Yes, I am living as married with partner
No, I am not living as married with partner

data_dictionary.name: educ_category
data_dictionary.title: Education
data_dictionary.description: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

enum: Some college credit but less than 1 year of college credit
1 or more years of college credit but no degree
Graduate degree (e.g., MSW, MA, MS, JD, MD, DSW, EdD, PhD)

data_dictionary.name: educ_highest_grade
data_dictionary.title: Education:  Highest grade level (if less than GED or h.s. diploma)
data_dictionary.description: What is the highest grade completed?

data_dictionary.name: educ_other_specified
data_dictionary.title: Education: Other specified
data_dictionary.description: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

data_dictionary.name: intv_while_incarc
data_dictionary.title: Interviewed during incarceration
data_dictionary.description: Interview conducted with participant during incarceration?

data_dictionary.name: days_incarcerated_interval
data_dictionary.title: Days incarcerated (in past 30/xx days)
data_dictionary.description: During the past xx/30 days, how many days have you been incarcerated?

data_dictionary.name: ever_rx_moud
data_dictionary.title: Medication ever prescribed for opioid use disorder?
data_dictionary.description: Have you ever been prescribed and taken medication to treat opioid use disorder?  (Illicit use should be excluded.)

data_dictionary.name: months_daily_bup
data_dictionary.title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Lifetime months
data_dictionary.description: Lifetime months (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])

data_dictionary.name: months_sublocade
data_dictionary.title: Buprenorphine injection (Sublocade):  Lifetime months
data_dictionary.description: Lifetime months (buprenorphine injection [Sublocade])

data_dictionary.name: months_weekly_brixadi
data_dictionary.title: Buprenorphine  weekly injection (Brixadi):  Lifetime months
data_dictionary.description: Lifetime months (buprenorphine weekly injection [Brixadi])

data_dictionary.name: months_monthly_brixadi
data_dictionary.title: Buprenorphine  monthly injection (Brixadi):  Lifetime months
data_dictionary.description: Lifetime months (buprenorphine monthly injection [Brixadi])

data_dictionary.name: months_probuphine_implant
data_dictionary.title: Buprenorphine 6-month implant (Probuphine):  Lifetime months
data_dictionary.description: Lifetime months (buprenorphine 6-month implant [Probuphine])

data_dictionary.name: months_daily_ntx
data_dictionary.title: Naltrexone daily (oral):  Lifetime months
data_dictionary.description: Lifetime months (Naltrexone daily (oral))

data_dictionary.name: months_monthly_vivitrol
data_dictionary.title: Naltrexone monthly injection (Vivitrol):  Lifetime months
data_dictionary.description: Lifetime months (Naltrexone monthly injection [Vivitrol])

data_dictionary.name: months_methadone
data_dictionary.title: Methadone daily:  Lifetime months
data_dictionary.description: Lifetime months (methadone daily)
